response.overview: Dedicated to the kids who truly care...  FYA Fest’s 6th annual installment took place in Tampa, FL at the Orpheum in January 2019. A perfect display of youthful energy and unity, the fest brought together some of the brightest bands in the scene for a weekend of hardcore that will forever be immortalized in the hearts and memories of it’s attendees.  Now, see the fest for yourself as PLEAD YOUR CASE brings you highlights from the monumental occasion, portraying FYA 6 through live and interview footage...  Featuring:  SEED OF PAIN FIELD AGENT RESULT OF CHOICE MAGNITUDE INCLINATION DIZTORT METHOD OF DOUBT YEAR OF THE KNIFE NEVER ENDING GAME POINT OF CONTACT SEARCH FOR PURPOSE RESTRAINING ORDER
response.tagline: Dedicated to the kids who truly care...
response.title: FYA Fest 6
